T02D2580:70b-0: @70b * // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bklag pa'i sgom khog bzhugs //
T02D2580:70b-2: # // 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2580:70b-3: bsgom pa 'di ni slob dpon gyi man ngag tu byas pa yin te /
T02D2580:70b-4: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2580:70b-5: dang por 'jug pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste //
T02D2580:70b-6: de la zhugs te 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' mngon sum du byas nas kyang /
T02D2580:70b-7: sems can skyabs dang dpung gnyen med pa srid par
T02D2580:70b-8: lhung zhing ma grol ba rnams kyi don bya bar
T02D2580:70b-9: bsam mo // de ltar sems can gyi don bya
T02D2580:70b-10: ba'i thabs kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis byas te
T02D2580:70b-12: de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag bcu bsgoms te //
T02D2580:70b-16: rjes su yi rang ba dang //
T02D2580:70b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02D2580:70b-19: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2580:70b-21: de la phyag btsal ba ni rang gi snying gar
T02D2580:70b-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aa
T02D2580:70b-23: dkar po bsgom // aa de las 'od zer phyogs
T02D2580:70b-24: bcur 'phros pas phyogs bcu nas sngon lhun gyis grub
T02D2580:70b-26: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /
T02D2580:70b-28: rang sangs rgyas thams cad spyad drangs te /
T02D2580:70b-29: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol la /
T02D2580:70b-30: rang gi rdo rje slob dpon gang yin yang de dag dang lhan cig tu zhugs par bsams la /
T02D2580:70b-31: de dag gi mdun du thal mo sbyar la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02D2580:70b-32: de ltar phyag btsal nas mchod pa dbul te /
T02D2580:70b-33: rnal 'byor ba dag gi thugs kar yi ge aa bsgoms la de las kyang 'od zer spros te /
T02D2580:70b-34: mchod pa rnam pa lnga me tog gi gdugs pa dang /
T02D2580:71a-2: spos kyang rang bzhin gyis dri zhim por spyar ba'i dri mar gyur pa'i dri dang spos rgya dang /
T02D2580:71a-4: dri chab dang lha bshos dang /
T02D2580:71a-5: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa nam mkha'i sprin
T02D2580:71a-6: phung tsam rgya mtsho ltar gtibs pas mchod par bsgom
T02D2580:71a-7: de nas sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar sdig
T02D2580:71a-8: pa bshags te / dus gsum du bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang /
T02D2580:71a-9: gzhan byed du stsal pa dang /
T02D2580:71a-10: byed pa la dga' bar sbyor ba dang /
T02D2580:71a-11: dngos gzhi dang 'jug pa dang bcas pa thams cad bshags te /
T02D2580:71a-12: dran pa ni khas blangs ma dran pa ni bsdus te /
T02D2580:71a-13: 'gyod pa skyes nas phyis mi bya bar sdom pa blangs nas bshags pa'o //
T02D2580:71a-14: de yang bshags pa'i gnas 'phags pa dang /
T02D2580:71a-16: bshags pa po rnams mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02D2580:71a-17: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D2580:71a-20: rnal 'byor pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dod chags dang
T02D2580:71a-21: zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum gyis ma 'dres pa
T02D2580:71a-22: la / phrag dog med pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2580:71a-23: spro ba ni rjes su yi rang bar bsgom pa'o //
T02D2580:71a-24: de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba ni //
T02D2580:71a-25: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bgyis pa'i bsod
T02D2580:71a-26: nams kyis sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i
T02D2580:71a-27: byang chub thob par gyur cig par bsngos la bsgom
T02D2580:71a-28: mod // de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom ste /
T02D2580:71a-29: sangs rgyas ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsnyen te skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom mo //
T02D2580:71a-30: chos ni chos bsgom pa bdag med pa'i chos la brten cing bsgoms la skyabs su 'gro'o //
T02D2580:71a-32: rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mi 'gro ste /
T02D2580:71a-33: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la brten cing bsgoms te skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom mo //
T02D2580:71a-34: de la lam bstan pa ni /
T02D2580:71a-35: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas grub pa'i lam rdo
T02D2580:71a-36: rje theg pa'i don 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
T02D2580:71a-37: thing nge 'dzin bsgom zhing mtshan brjod pa ni lam
T02D2580:71a-38: bstan pa'o // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa
T02D2580:71a-39: ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bskyab pa'i
T02D2580:71a-40: don du snags rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2580:71a-41: sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2580:71b-0: sangs @71b rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang /
T02D2580:71b-1: ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang //
T02D2580:71b-2: dbugs ma phung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02D2580:71b-3: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs
T02D2580:71b-4: su mya ngan las bzla par bya'o zhes de ltar
T02D2580:71b-5: bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag bcu bsgoms nas gsol
T02D2580:71b-7: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol bzhes bya'o //
T02D2580:71b-8: de nas dam bca' bar bya ste /
T02D2580:71b-9: bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas bla na med pa'i
T02D2580:71b-10: byang chub kyi sems de ring phyin tshang bskyed par
T02D2580:71b-11: bgyi'o // ji ltar dus gsum mgon rnams kyis //
T02D2580:71b-12: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa bzhin //
T02D2580:71b-13: de bzhin bla med byang chub sems //
T02D2580:71b-14: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2580:71b-15: bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02D2580:71b-16: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2580:71b-17: sems can don gyi tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2580:71b-18: bdag gis brtan por so sor gzung //
T02D2580:71b-19: de nas rigs lnga'i sdom pa bzung ste /
T02D2580:71b-20: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
T02D2580:71b-21: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang /
T02D2580:71b-22: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2580:71b-23: sngom pa sangs rgyas sbyor bskyed pa //
T02D2580:71b-24: 'di ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2580:71b-25: rdo rje rig skyi sdom pa bzung //
T02D2580:71b-26: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya gsum //
T02D2580:71b-27: bdag gis mi gtong gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2580:71b-28: slob dpon ngag kyang gzung ba rab gyi //
T02D2580:71b-29: rin po che'i sdom pa gzung //
T02D2580:71b-30: sbyin pa rnam bzhi dus drug tu //
T02D2580:71b-31: brtan po nyid du sbyin par bya //
T02D2580:71b-32: padma rigs kyi sdom pa gzung //
T02D2580:71b-33: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum //
T02D2580:71b-34: dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2580:71b-35: las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa gzung //
T02D2580:71b-36: bdag gis mi gtong gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2580:71b-37: gong du ma byung ba'i lhag ma kun 'di sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
T02D2580:71b-38: mi dge ba bcu spang ba dang //
T02D2580:71b-40: mya ngan las 'das pa dang du mi len pa dang /
T02D2580:71b-41: theg pa chung ba dang 'jigs pa'i sa spangs pa dang /
T02D2580:71b-42: lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02D2580:71b-43: gdon la sogs pa'i phyag rgya mi smad pa dang /
T02D2580:71b-44: de ring phan chad bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D2580:71b-45: ma thob kyi bar du gzung bar bya'o zhes dam
T02D2580:71b-47: / de nas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de //
T02D2580:71b-48: ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang //
T02D2580:71b-49: ma grol ba rnams grol ba dang //
T02D2580:72a-1: ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang /
T02D2580:72a-2: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes sems bskyed do //
T02D2580:72a-3: de yan chod bsod nams kyi tshogs bsgom pa'o //
T02D2580:72a-4: don dam pa byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi tshogs bsgom pa ni //
T02D2580:72a-5: dang po mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom pa yin la /
T02D2580:72a-6: de ni ye shes lnga bsgom pa yin te /
T02D2580:72a-7: dang po chos thams cad mi dmigs la mi rtog pa /
T02D2580:72a-8: rang bzhin med pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba tha snyad tsam du yod la /
T02D2580:72a-9: don dam par rang bzhin med pa de bzhin nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgom /
T02D2580:72a-10: de nas me long lta bu'i ye shes bsgom ste /
T02D2580:72a-11: dper na me long g-ya' dag pa'i nang du /
T02D2580:72a-12: gzugs brnyan snang zhing gsal ba ltar rang bzhin gyis 'do gsal ba /
T02D2580:72a-13: de las chos kyi dbyings rgyu mthun pa'i rnam par smin pa'i ye shes de las /
T02D2580:72a-14: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi gang zag phung po dang /
T02D2580:72a-15: chos thams cad ji ltar yin pa'i chos nyid kyi
T02D2580:72a-16: ngang de la phyin ci ma log par snang ba
T02D2580:72a-17: dang / sems rnam par dag pa log rtog glo
T02D2580:72a-18: bur gyi dri ma dang 'dra bas bsgribs pa tsam
T02D2580:72a-19: dang / yin la / sems can gyi sems chos kyi rang bzhin du gsal bar bsgom mo //
T02D2580:72a-20: sems can gyis de ltar mi rtogs te /
T02D2580:72a-21: 'gro ba las mi thar ba la snying rje chen po bskyed de /
T02D2580:72a-22: 'gro ba las thar par bya'o zhes bsgom mo //
T02D2580:72a-23: de nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom ste /
T02D2580:72a-25: khams dang skye mched la bya /
T02D2580:72a-26: mu stegs pas brtags pa'i gang zag tu lta ba med /
T02D2580:72a-27: nyan thos pa'i chos rdul tsam du yod par lta ba'i bdag med par lta ba dang /
T02D2580:72a-28: sems tsam pa'i sems yod par lta bde yang bdag med par lta /
T02D2580:72a-29: chos thams cad la bdag med par bsgom /
T02D2580:72a-30: de yang bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /
T02D2580:72a-33: chos thams cad bdag med par mnyam pa'o //
T02D2580:72a-34: mdor na rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum du bsgom mo //
T02D2580:72a-35: aom aa k'a ro mu khm sarba dharmm'a n'a a' dya ru tpanna tv'a ta /
T02D2580:72a-36: ces pas byin gyis brlab po /
T02D2580:72a-37: de la aa ni aa aa nutpanna tva' ta /
T02D2580:72a-39: chos thams cad ma skyes pa stong pa nyid ces bya ste /
T02D2580:72b-0: bdag @72b gzhan stong pa nyid du mnyam par bsgom mo //
T02D2580:72b-1: de'i 'og tu so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom ste /
T02D2580:72b-2: de ni bdag dang gzhan du phye ste /
T02D2580:72b-4: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i mi
T02D2580:72b-5: rtog pa'i ngang las bdag dang gzhan du yang dag
T02D2580:72b-6: pa'i kun rdzob tu phye ste /
T02D2580:72b-7: rang gi mtshan nyid du bdag don bya ba'i gnas sems can gzhan mtshan ma med pa'i sgo nas /
T02D2580:72b-8: so sor phye zhing brtag par byas te bsgoms nas /
T02D2580:72b-9: spyi'i mtshan nyid don dam par mtshan med par shes
T02D2580:72b-10: pa'i so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes so
T02D2580:72b-11: // de'i ngang las shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bsgom ste /
T02D2580:72b-12: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las 'das pa gcig dang
T02D2580:72b-13: du ma dang shin tu bral ba rnam par dag
T02D2580:72b-14: pa / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes stong pa nyid bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin nam /
T02D2580:72b-15: rnam par thar pa bzhi'i rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02D2580:72b-16: de'i ngang las smon lam dang thugs rje'i dbang gis /
T02D2580:72b-18: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2580:72b-19: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes bsgom ste /
T02D2580:72b-20: dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes 'gro ba'i don
T02D2580:72b-21: bya ba'i rgyu bdag dang gzhan mtshan ma med bzhin
T02D2580:72b-23: mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don bya bar dran te /
T02D2580:72b-24: sprul ba sna tshogs pas sprul cing spros nas sems can srid pa las bsgral te /
T02D2580:72b-25: 'od zer gyis ngan song gsum la khyab nas sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byas nas /
T02D2580:72b-26: sems can rnam par grol nas lha dang mi la bkod de /
T02D2580:72b-27: de nas so so'i dbang po rim pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2580:72b-28: theg pa gsum gyi chos kyis grol bar byas nas /
T02D2580:72b-29: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba dang /
T02D2580:72b-30: nyan thos rnams sems can gyi don la bcug nas /
T02D2580:72b-31: theg pa chen po la bkod pa dang /
T02D2580:72b-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams srid pa la chags pa
T02D2580:72b-33: la stong pa nyid kyi don bstan nas sangs rgyas
T02D2580:72b-34: par bya'o bar bsgom pa ni bya ba nan tan
T02D2580:72b-36: de ltar 'jug pa byung chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2580:72b-37: smon pa byang chub sems kun rdzob ste //
T02D2580:72b-38: des ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang //
T02D2580:72b-39: don dam byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis bsgom pa bstan nas //
T02D2580:73a-1: 'jig rten pa'i ye shes bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te /
T02D2580:73a-2: bdag gi sems gzung 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i ye shes las /
T02D2580:73a-3: khro ba'i sa bon h'um sngo nag sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug khyab pa tsam cig bsgom mo //
T02D2580:73a-4: de'i 'phro 'dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab nas sems can gyi don byas te /
T02D2580:73a-5: slar h'um la thim pa las khro bo'i rdo rje
T02D2580:73a-6: rtse lnga pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug khyab pa
T02D2580:73a-7: ste / de ni nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig
T02D2580:73a-8: rten pa de 'dul ba'i don du bum pa la
T02D2580:73a-12: lho ser nub dmar byang ljang gu'o //
T02D2580:73a-13: rtse mo lnga yar lta ba ye shes lnga /
T02D2580:73a-14: mar lta ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2580:73a-17: rdo rje'i dra ba'i sbubs su gyur pa nang stong par bsgom mo //
T02D2580:73a-18: de'i nang du bhr'um dkar po las rin po che'i mchod rten kha dog bzhi dang ldan pa /
T02D2580:73a-19: tshad stong gsum gyi 'jig rten khyab pa cig bsgom mo //
T02D2580:73a-20: de'i bum pa'i nang du yi ge hri las chos kyi 'byung gnas dbyibs zur gsum du bsgom mo //
T02D2580:73a-21: de'i nang du yi ge aa las kha dog sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram bsgom mo /
T02D2580:73a-22: de'i dbus su ye ge bhr'um dkar po las gzhal
T02D2580:73a-23: yas khang grub bzhi pa tva ra na dang bcas
T02D2580:73a-24: par bsgom mo // de yang sangs rgyas dang sems can chos nyid du mnyam pas gru bzhi'o //
T02D2580:73a-25: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis shar gyi sgo'o //
T02D2580:73a-26: yang dag par spong pa bzhi'i don gyis lho'i sgo'o //
T02D2580:73a-27: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i don gyis nub kyi sgo'o //
T02D2580:73a-28: dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin gyis byang gi sgo'o //
T02D2580:73a-29: stobs lnga'i rang bzhin gyis sgo srung bzhi'o //
T02D2580:73a-30: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'o //
T02D2580:73a-31: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gdugs dang me tog gi phreng ba'o //
T02D2580:73a-32: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis me long dang rin po che'o //
T02D2580:73a-33: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyis sems can rnams la chos ston pas /
T02D2580:73a-34: 'dul bas 'dul ba'i rang bzhin dril bu dang dar gyi cod pan no //
T02D2580:73a-35: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bsams pas sum brtsegs su gyur pa'o //
T02D2580:73a-36: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi dbu rtse'i gtsug tor du gyur pa'o //
T02D2580:73a-37: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin gyis tva ra na'o //
T02D2580:73b-0: ting nge 'dzin @73b mu ma chod pa bsgoms pas mu khyud ma chad pa'o //
T02D2580:73b-1: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags rdo rje phreng ba'o //
T02D2580:73b-2: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od lnga'i kha dog gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2580:73b-3: de'i nang du re mig dgu snam bu dang ldan
T02D2580:73b-4: pa la dbus su seng ge'i khri mi 'jigs pa
T02D2580:73b-6: stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags su shar du glang po che'o //
T02D2580:73b-7: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis lhor rta'o //
T02D2580:73b-8: dbang bcu'i rang bzhin gyis nub tu rma bya'o //
T02D2580:73b-9: phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i
T02D2580:73b-10: rang bzhin gyis byang du nam mkha' lding gi khri'o
T02D2580:73b-11: // de dag gi steng du rin po che'i khri dang padma'i gdan dang zla ba'i gdan brtsegs pa'o //
T02D2580:73b-12: de dag gi phyogs bzhi thams cad dang /
T02D2580:73b-13: mtshams kyi re mig dang snam bu dang grub chad la zla ba'i gdan bsgom mo //
T02D2580:73b-14: de la padma ni thabs sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o //
T02D2580:73b-15: zla ba ni dge rtsa ba byang chub kyi myu gu bskyed pa'o //
T02D2580:73b-16: de nas dbus su seng ge dang zla ba'i gdan
T02D2580:73b-17: la bdag gi sems gzung 'dzin dag pa'i ye shes
T02D2580:73b-18: de nyid yi ge aa dkar po cig tu bsgoms
T02D2580:73b-19: la / de'i 'phro 'du las rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2580:73b-20: chen po byang chub sems dang rang bzhin gcig pa
T02D2580:73b-21: la / / zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa zhal phyogs bzhir gzigs pa /
T02D2580:73b-22: rgyan mi mnga' ba zhi ba'i rang bzhin dbu la
T02D2580:73b-23: ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D2580:73b-24: ye shes dang dbyer med pa'i don sku mdog dkar
T02D2580:73b-25: po chos nyid la nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma
T02D2580:73b-26: gos pa'i rtags / phyag brgyad thugs ka na byang
T02D2580:73b-27: chub kyi mchog gi phyag rgya bcas pa la snying
T02D2580:73b-28: rje dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2580:73b-29: gos pa'i rtags / du bsgom mo // de'i thugs
T02D2580:73b-30: kar yi ge hr'i: las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku
T02D2580:73b-31: mdog dkar po zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa dbu lnga
T02D2580:73b-32: la gtsug gi dbu rta mgo dkar po ste /
T02D2580:73b-33: khams gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'am dbang du sdud pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2580:73b-34: zhal shar phyogs su gzigs pa sngo //
T02D2580:73b-36: byang ljang ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2580:73b-37: phyag g-yas pa bzhin ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D2580:73b-38: g-yon pa bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2580:73b-39: pa stong phrag brgya pa dum pa re re bsnams
T02D2580:73b-40: pa'o // nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i rtags ral gri
T02D2580:73b-41: dam pa'i chos ston pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pas
T02D2580:74a-1: rang bzhin yin pas sku mdog dkar po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas /
T02D2580:74a-2: sna tshogs kyi na bzas brgyan pa /
T02D2580:74a-3: phud [*phung] bu lnga dang ldan par bsgom /
T02D2580:74a-4: de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom //
T02D2580:74a-5: rtsibs drug la shar gyi rtsibs ni sngo g-yas g-yon ni dkar lho ser nub dmar /
T02D2580:74a-8: rigs drug gi rang bzhin yin pas rtsibs drug go //
T02D2580:74a-9: rten cing 'brel ba'i rang bzhin yin pas 'khor lo mu khyud dang po la /
T02D2580:74a-10: aom sarba dharmma aa bha sa sva bh'a ba bi shuddha badzra aa a'a aam aa:/
T02D2580:74a-12: gnyis pa las sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis kyi sa bon /
T02D2580:74a-13: aa a'a ai a'i au a'a ae aee ao aoo aam aa:/
T02D2580:74a-15: rtsibs drug la shar gyi rtibs la /
T02D2580:74a-16: aom du:khatstshe d'a ya te na ma:/
T02D2580:74a-17: lho'i rtsibs la aom b'a g'i sva r'a ya te
T02D2580:74a-18: na ma: nub kyi rtsibs la aom badzra t'ikshn'a ya
T02D2580:74a-19: te na ma:/ byang gi rtsibs la aom dzny'a na
T02D2580:74a-20: k'a y'a te na ma: shar stod kyi rtsibs la
T02D2580:74a-21: te na ma:/ / aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'utta ye na ma:/
T02D2580:74a-23: aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma:/
T02D2580:74a-24: de'i phyi rol rtsibs mchan gyi mu khyud la sngags kyi phreng ba /
T02D2580:74a-25: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya zhes pa dgod /
T02D2580:74a-26: mu khyud phyi ma la ka kha sum cu rtsa gnyis dgod //
T02D2580:74a-27: des mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sa bon yin no //
T02D2580:74a-28: 'khor lo'i lte ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
T02D2580:74a-29: du yi ge a'a: las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye
T02D2580:74a-30: shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig /
T02D2580:74a-31: phyag gnyis pa / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2580:74a-32: gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa phyag gnyis na autpa la bsnams pa ste /
T02D2580:74a-33: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i don to //
T02D2580:74a-34: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aa dkar po bsgom te /
T02D2580:74a-35: thams cad mkhyen pa dang lam mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T02D2580:74a-36: gsum gyi rang bzhin can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas /
T02D2580:74a-37: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa /
T02D2580:74a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsgom pa'o //
T02D2580:74a-39: aa de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
T02D2580:74a-40: dang por bskyed pa'i rim pa las phyir 'phros pa'i
T02D2580:74b-0: @74b mchod rten gyi bum pa'i nang nas phyir 'phros
T02D2580:74b-1: pas / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
T02D2580:74b-2: gyi khams su sems can nyon mongs pa lnga dang
T02D2580:74b-3: pas / / tshul khrims 'chal ba la sogs pa dag par byas te /
T02D2580:74b-5: de las kyang phyir 'phros nas rdo rje khro bo'i zhal nas byung ste /
T02D2580:74b-6: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du khyab nas sems can gyi
T02D2580:74b-7: don byas te slar 'dus pas rim par yi ge
T02D2580:74b-9: rdo rje dbyings kyi lha rnams su sprul la /
T02D2580:74b-11: sems can gyi don byas nas /
T02D2580:74b-12: yang slar 'dus pas sems ma rdo rje ma la
T02D2580:74b-13: sogs pa bzhi ni dbus kyi gtso bo la bskor
T02D2580:74b-14: / rigs lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni gtso bo la thim par ba'o //
T02D2580:74b-15: rigs bzhi ni glang po che'i khri la mi bskyod pa la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba /
T02D2580:74b-16: rta'i khri la rin chen 'byung ldan la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba /
T02D2580:74b-17: rma bya'i khri la snang ba mtha' yas la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba /
T02D2580:74b-18: nam mkha' lding gi khri la don yod grub pa la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor bar bsgom mo //
T02D2580:74b-19: mtshams kyi re mig gzhi la sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D2580:74b-20: snam pu la mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D2580:74b-21: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go //
T02D2580:74b-22: sgo bzhi'i gnas su sgo ba bzhis bskor bar bsgoms la /
T02D2580:74b-26: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa yan chad bklag par bya'o //
T02D2580:74b-27: de nas mtshan gyi yig 'bru 'od zer dkar po
T02D2580:74b-28: spros te 'do zer gyis sems can gyi nyon mongs
T02D2580:74b-29: pa gti mug la sogs pa dag par byas nas
T02D2580:74b-30: yang dag pa'i don dang ldan par byas te /
T02D2580:74b-31: slar 'dus pas mtshan gyi sngags brgyad cu rtsa drug
T02D2580:74b-32: yod pa rigs lngar phyes te phyogs bzhi nas dkyil
T02D2580:74b-33: 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o //
T02D2580:74b-34: de nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po mi snang bar byas nas /
T02D2580:74b-35: dbus kyi gdan la yi ge aa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po /
T02D2580:74b-36: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbu la ral pa gyen
T02D2580:74b-37: du 'khyil ba rgyan mi mnga' ba phyag gnyis byang
T02D2580:74b-38: chub mchog gi phyag rgyar mdzad pa bsgom mo //
T02D2580:74b-39: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D2580:74b-40: yi ge dh'i: las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog
T02D2580:75a-0: dkar la phyag mtshan gong dang mthun @75a * //
T02D2580:75a-2: de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu
T02D2580:75a-3: pa la mu khyud bzhi lte ba dang bcas par
T02D2580:75a-4: bsgom mo // rtsibs dkar po bcu la /
T02D2580:75a-5: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na murtt'a ya te na ma:/
T02D2580:75a-6: zhes pa rim par dgod do //
T02D2580:75a-7: gzhan ma gong ma dang mthun no //
T02D2580:75a-8: dbus kyi lte ba la zla ba'i steng du yi
T02D2580:75a-9: ge aa las 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ye
T02D2580:75a-10: shes spyi gzugs zhes bya ba /
T02D2580:75a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'jam dpal ye shes
T02D2580:75a-12: sems dpa' dkar po phyag g-yas na ral gri g-yon
T02D2580:75a-13: 'khor lo bsnams pa zur phud lnga dang ldan pa
T02D2580:75a-14: / gzhon nu rgyun gyis brgyan par bsgom mo //
T02D2580:75a-15: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aa dkar po bsgom /
T02D2580:75a-16: de la 'od 'phros pas gong ma'i rim pa dang
T02D2580:75a-17: 'dra ba rnam par snang mdzad 'phros pas sems can
T02D2580:75a-18: gyi nyon mongs pa'i gti mug dag par byas te
T02D2580:75a-19: / slar rim par 'dus pas yi ge aa la thim ste /
T02D2580:75a-20: mtshan gyi snags ni sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che /
T02D2580:75a-22: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2580:75a-23: zhes pa'i bar du bklag par bya'o //
T02D2580:75a-24: de nas sngags brjod pa tsam na sngags las 'od
T02D2580:75a-25: zer dkar po 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang
T02D2580:75a-26: po spros pas sems can kun de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2580:75a-27: rigs su sangs rgyas par byas te /
T02D2580:75a-28: slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags brgyad cu rtsa gcig yod pa rigs lngar phye ste /
T02D2580:75a-29: sum cu rtsa bdun de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la thim /
T02D2580:75a-30: rigs bzhi'i sku phyag rgya sum cu rtsa drug thim par bya'o //
T02D2580:75a-31: de nas rnam par snang mdzad bsdus te shar du bkod nas /
T02D2580:75a-32: dbus kyi yi ge h'um las mi bskyod pa sku
T02D2580:75a-33: mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan mi
T02D2580:75a-34: mnga' ba ral ba'i dbu rgyan can phyag g-yas pas
T02D2580:75a-35: sa gnon pa bdud dang bgegs kyis mi bskyod pa'i
T02D2580:75a-36: rtags / phyag g-yon thugs kar thing nge 'dzin gyi tshul du bzhugs pa /
T02D2580:75a-37: de'i thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du
T02D2580:75a-38: yi ge dh'i: las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog
T02D2580:75a-39: dang phyag mtshan gong ma dang mthun /
T02D2580:75a-40: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo //
T02D2580:75a-41: de'i rtsibs brgyad la kha dog sngon po mu khyud ni dkar po /
T02D2580:75a-43: aom du: khatstshe d'a ya te na ma: zhes pa'i yig 'bru re re dgod /
T02D2580:75a-44: phyi ma gong ma dang mthun par bya /
T02D2580:75a-45: dbus kyi lte ba'i yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'i
T02D2580:75b-0: 'jam dpal ye shes sems @75b dpa' sdug bsngal gcod
T02D2580:75b-1: pa zhes bya ba sku mdog sngon po rgyan gong
T02D2580:75b-2: dang 'dra ba / phyag g-yas ral gri /
T02D2580:75b-4: thugs kar zla ba la h'um sngon po bsgom mo //
T02D2580:75b-5: de las 'od zer rim par phyir 'phros pas mi bskyod pa khor bo'i rigs kyi 'od 'phros te /
T02D2580:75b-6: sems can thams cad kyi zhe sdang dag par byas te /
T02D2580:75b-7: slar 'dus pa las yi ge h'um la thim par byas la mtshan gyi sngags ni /
T02D2580:75b-10: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du bklag par bya'o //
T02D2580:75b-11: 'od zer sngon po khro bor spros nas sems can gyi don byas /
T02D2580:75b-12: slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags bdun cu rtsa gnyis yod pa rigs lngar bsgoms la /
T02D2580:75b-13: phyogs bzhi nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o //
T02D2580:75b-14: de nas mi bskyod pa slar bsdus te /
T02D2580:75b-15: rang gi gdan la bkod nas rnam par snang mdzad nub kyi gdan la bkod de /
T02D2580:75b-16: dbus kyi gtso bo la hr'i: las snang ba mtha' yas bskyed //
T02D2580:75b-17: sku mdog dmar po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2580:75b-18: phyin pa'i rang bzhin las mi g-yo ba'i ting 'dzin
T02D2580:75b-19: gyi 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bsgom mo //
T02D2580:75b-20: de'i thugs kar dh'i: las dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom //
T02D2580:75b-21: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa kha dog dmar po /
T02D2580:75b-22: aom badzra t'ikshn'a ya te na ma: yig 'bru brgyad dkod /
T02D2580:75b-24: dbus su zla ba'i gdan la yi ge hr'i: las 'jam dpal rdo rje rnon po /
T02D2580:75b-25: sku mdog dkar po phyag g-yas na ral gri 'phyar ba /
T02D2580:75b-26: g-yon padma thugs kar bsnams pa /
T02D2580:75b-27: thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la hr'i: bsgom /
T02D2580:75b-28: de las 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas spro /
T02D2580:75b-29: sems can gyi 'dod chags zhi bar byas te /
T02D2580:75b-30: slar 'dus pas yi ge hr'i: la thim par byas /
T02D2580:75b-31: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2580:75b-33: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02D2580:75b-35: 'od zer dmar po spro bar bya'o //
T02D2580:75b-36: slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags ni nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lngar bgos la ;
T02D2580:75b-37: ; dkyil 'khor la thim par byas te /
T02D2580:75b-38: de nas snang ba mtha' yas rang gi gnas la bzhugs nas /
T02D2580:75b-40: dbus kyi gtso bo yi ge aa las bskyed pa
T02D2580:75b-41: rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po phyag rgyan
T02D2580:76a-0: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas @76a * //
T02D2580:76a-1: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D2580:76a-2: aom b'a g'i shva r'a ya te na ma: yi ge 'bru brgyad dgod /
T02D2580:76a-4: de'i lte ba la zla ba'i steng du yi ge
T02D2580:76a-5: aom las 'jam dpal ngag gi dbang phyug sku mdog

T02D2580:76a-7: pa / g-yas pa ral gri 'phyar ba /
T02D2580:76a-8: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge aom /
T02D2580:76a-9: de las rin chen 'byung ldan spro //
T02D2580:76a-10: slar 'dus yi ge aom la thim //
T02D2580:76a-12: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
T02D2580:76a-14: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa'i bar gyis sngags brjod nas /
T02D2580:76a-15: 'od zer ser po 'phros te sems can gyi don byas /
T02D2580:76a-16: slar 'dus pas mtshan gyi sngags brgya rtsa lnga rigs lngar bgos te /
T02D2580:76a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o //
T02D2580:76a-18: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan rang gi gnas su bkod nas /
T02D2580:76a-19: rnam par snang mdzad byang gi gdan la bkod de /
T02D2580:76a-20: dbus su gtso bo yi ge aa las bskyed pa /
T02D2580:76a-21: don yod grub pa sku mdog sna tshogs te ljang gu /
T02D2580:76a-22: phyag gnyis skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D2580:76a-23: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02D2580:76a-24: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo ljang gu rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D2580:76a-25: aom dzny'a na k'a y'a ya te na ma: zhes 'bru brgyad dgod do //
T02D2580:76a-27: de'i dbus su zla ba'i steng du gdan la yi
T02D2580:76a-28: ge aa las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes kyi
T02D2580:76a-30: sku mdog ljang gu phyag g-yon pa na rdo rje rgya gram /
T02D2580:76a-31: g-yas ral gri thugs kar 'phyar ba /
T02D2580:76a-32: de'i thugs ka na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi
T02D2580:76a-33: ge aa de las don yod grub pa spro sems
T02D2580:76a-35: slar rim par 'dus pas yi ge aa la thim par bya'o //
T02D2580:76a-37: sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba //
T02D2580:76a-39: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces pa yan chad bklag go //
T02D2580:76a-40: yig 'bru las 'od ljang gu 'phros pas sems can
T02D2580:76a-41: gyi don byas slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags
T02D2580:76a-42: dgu bcu rtsa lnga rigs lngar bgos te /
T02D2580:76a-44: de nas don yod grub pa rang gi gnas su bkod de /
T02D2580:76a-45: rnam par snang mdzad mi snang bar gyur nas /
T02D2580:76a-46: dbus kyi gtso bo yi ge aa las byang sems rdo rje bskyed de /
T02D2580:76b-0: sku mdog @76b dkar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D2580:76b-1: rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can bsgom /
T02D2580:76b-2: de'i thugs kar gong ma bzhin du dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02D2580:76b-3: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs dgu pa /
T02D2580:76b-4: aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma: yi ge 'bru re re dgod do //
T02D2580:76b-5: mu khyud gong ma dang mthun no //
T02D2580:76b-6: lte ba'i zla ba'i gdan la yi ge aa las
T02D2580:76b-7: bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal aa ra pa tsa na zhes
T02D2580:76b-8: bya ba / sku mdog dkar po g-yon pas glegs bam bsnams nas thugs kar bzhag pa /
T02D2580:76b-10: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge aa bsgoms nas /
T02D2580:76b-11: de las rdo rje sems dpa' spro bar bya /
T02D2580:76b-12: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byas te /
T02D2580:76b-13: slar 'dus pas thugs ka'i aa la thim par byas
T02D2580:76b-14: nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshigs bcad
T02D2580:76b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam par snang mdzad chen po dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2580:76b-17: 'di ni spyi'i rnal 'byor yin pas 'di ltar brjod par bya'o //
T02D2580:76b-18: rigs drug lha rang gi yi dam byed pa'i tshe bsgoms nas brjod par bya'o //
